GameAboutMessage:
Game "Grow The Pig"

Commands:
/grow - once a day feed your pig
/name - name your piggy
/my   - weigh and listen
/top  - top of the fattest pigs in your barn
GameNamePig: Name of your pig: {name} Change name — /name pig_name.
